author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_1_X` (branch `CMSSW_16_0_X`): 
   * This is the PR for the master branch, which will then be backported down to 15_1_X (the latter is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development).

These updates correspond to the updates and fixes accumulated after the "V1.0" HIon menu for the 2025 PbPb data-taking period was released. This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

- [CMSHLT-3655](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3655) [TRK] HLT-Tracking updates for 2026 menu: pixel digi morphing
- [CMSHLT-3685](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3685) [HIN] Fix to `RawSecond` in HIon menu
- [CMSHLT-3686](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3686) [HIN] Addition of HLT paths for `DoubleEG4_NotMBHF2` in the 2025 `HIon` menu
- [CMSHLT-3686](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3690) [HIN] Seeding `HLT_HIPuAK4CaloJet60Eta5p1_MinBiasHF1AND` paths with `L1_SingleJet28_BptxAND`
- [CMSHLT-3691](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3691) [DQM,TRK] Partial revert of [CMSHLT-3147](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3147)
- [CMSHLT-3693](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3693) [TRK] Update `maxHitsInModules` parameter for `hltSiPixelRecHitsPPOnAA*` HIon table

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, it will be backported to `CMSSW_15_1_X` which sis
title: HLT menu development for `15_1_X` (3/N) [`16_0_X`]
